name: getAudioMixingCurrentPosition
description:
Retrieves the playback position (ms) of the music file.Retrieves the playback position (ms) of the audio.
            You need to call this method after calling startAudioMixing and receiving the AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_CHANGED(PLAY) callback.
returns:
â‰¥ 0: The current playback position of the audio mixing, if this method call succeeds.
       < 0: Failure.
